entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 8 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
